plot: Two men and two women, each of whom weighs at least 600 pounds, undergo gastric-bypass surgery in 2004. The series follows the changes in their weight and in their lives over the next seven years.
plot_en: Two men and two women, each of whom weighs at least 600 pounds, undergo gastric-bypass surgery in 2004. The series follows the changes in their weight and in their lives over the next seven years.
plot_es: Two men and two women, each of whom weighs at least 600 pounds, undergo gastric-bypass surgery in 2004. The series follows the changes in their weight and in their lives over the next seven years.
title: My 600-lb Life
